statements.select: SELECT COUNT(T1.VBIS_ID) FROM BS_VehicleBrandInspireSumma T1 WHERE T1.VBIS_IsValid = 1 T1.VBIS_ID != #WHERE_VBIS_ID# T1.VBIS_Brand = #WHERE_VBIS_Brand# T1.VBIS_Inspire = #WHERE_VBIS_Inspire# T1.VBIS_ModelDesc = #WHERE_VBIS_ModelDesc#

SELECT DISTINCT T1.APA_VehicleBrand , T1.APA_VehicleInspire FROM BS_AutoPartsArchive T1 WHERE T1.APA_IsValid = 1 AND ( ISNULL(T1.APA_VehicleBrand, '') != '' AND #WHERE_VBIS_Brand# LIKE '%' + T1.APA_VehicleBrand + ';%' AND ISNULL(T1.APA_VehicleInspire, '') != '' AND #WHERE_VBIS_Inspire# LIKE '%' + T1.APA_VehicleInspire + ';%' )
